array.name: all_menu
array.item: "Milk. Homemade walnut and aniseed cake. Pear.";"Café latte. Vegetable sandwich.";" Breaded leeks with epper sauce.";"Rabbit stew with white wine and chives.";"Orange.";"Apple with cinnamon.";" Escarole salad, grated carrot and feta cheese.";"Eggplant omelette with bread and tomato.";"Fruit yogurt."

"Café latte. Wholegrain breakfast cereal.";"Melba toast with blue cheese and caramelized onion. Fresh lemon juice.";" Endives with apple and tartar sauce.";"Stewed stuffed squid.";"Banana.";"Curd with pine nuts.";" Cauliflower sauteed with spinach and tender garlic.";"Grilled chicken breast with fried green tomatoes.";"Pear compote."

"Tea. Mini serrano ham sandwich with virgin olive oil.";"Grapefruit segments with honey.";" Couscous with carrot and fresh mint.";"Eggs Benedict with lamb's lettuce.";"Mandarins.";"Orange.";" Star soup.";"Pisto with chickpeas.";"Grated apple with lemon juice."

"Café latte. Toast with arugula, fresh cheese and virgin olive oil.";"Yogurt. Muesli.";" Rice with chopped tortilla and peas.";"Cod stew with artichokes.";"Applesauce.";"Yogurt.";" Gazpachuelo.";"Pork tenderloin with mustard and baby carrots.";"Plain yogurt with hazelnuts and prunes."

"Milk with chocolate powder. Melba toast with apple marmalade.";"Mini tuna sandwich. Fresh orange juice.";" Tomato and basil soup.";"Faba beans sauteed with blood sausage.";"Pear.";"Oats.";" Thistles with almonds and pine nuts.";"Baked trout with Provencal tomatoes.";"Mandarins."

"Milk. Toast with virgin olive oil, garlic and oregano. Fresh pineapple.";"Appetizer: French or Italian bread.";" Macaroni with diced salmon.";"Chicken in pepitoria.";"Cream of orange with chocolate chips.";"Tarta de Santiago.";" Creamed spinach.";"Fried eggs with baked potatoes.";"Plain yogurt."

"Café latte. Croissant. Mandarins.";"Appetizer: fresh cheese macerated wtih pepper and olive oil.";" Zucchini bread.";"Octopus and onions.";"Apple pie.";"Fresh fruit juice.";" Cream of carrots.";"Cheese turnovers with red cabbage salad.";"Custard apple."
